title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 100 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 100 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands.
lineList.cn: （称谢诗）普天下当向耶和华欢呼。

lineList.en: Serve the LORD with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
lineList.cn: 你们当乐意事奉耶和华。当来向他歌唱。

lineList.en: Know ye that the LORD he is God: it is he that hath made us, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
lineList.cn: 你们当晓得耶和华是神。我们是他造的，也是属他的。我们是他的民，也是他草场的羊。

lineList.en: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
lineList.cn: 当称谢进入他的门，当赞美进入他的院。当感谢他，称颂他的名。

lineList.en: For the LORD is good; his mercy is everlasting; and his truth endureth to all generations.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华本为善，他的慈爱，存到永远，他的信实，直到万代。
